description: Suppose p and q = p+12 are primes. Define the difference pattern of (p,q) to be the successive differences of the primes in the range p to q. There are 14 possible difference patterns, namely [12], [2,10], [4,8], [6,6], [8,4], [10,2], [2,4,6], [2,6,4], [4,2,6], [4,6,2], [6,2,4], [6,4,2], [2,4,2,4] and [4,2,4,2]. Sequence gives smallest value of p for each difference pattern, sorted by magnitude.
